mapper.insert: insert into animal_object (uuid, name, bucket_name, create_time, user_uuid) values (#{uuid}, #{name}, #{bucketName}, #{createTime}, #{userUuid});
mapper.update: update animal_object SET name = #{name}, bucket_name = #{bucketName}, create_time = #{createTime} where uuid = #{uuid};
mapper.select: select uuid, name, bucket_name, create_time, user_uuid from animal_object where name like CONCAT('%',#{name},'%');
select uuid, name, bucket_name, create_time, user_uuid from animal_object where bucket_name = #{bucketName}
select uuid, name, bucket_name, create_time, user_uuid from animal_object where uuid = #{uuid}
SELECT COUNT(*) from animal_object where user_uuid = #{userUuid};
SELECT COUNT(*) from animal_object where bucket_name = #{bucketName};
